Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
This class is the controller of MVC pattern: it controls all the game flow.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Controller​(ProxyGameModel gameModel)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(int indexPlayer)
    This method starts the timer of the new player and adds the new player in the array in Game class
    void addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, int age, int indexClient)
    This method adds the player and sets all the information
    void askState()
    This method waits that all the players are in the game
    void buildBlock​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int row, int column, boolean isSpecialTurn, int indexPossibleBlock)
    This method builds a block in a box
    void canBuild​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method checks if the worker can build: if he cannot, the player loses, receives a lose notification and the other players receive a notification about who lost.
    void canBuildBeforeWorkerMove​(int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove)
    This method tells if a player can build before the worker move
    void canBuildSpecialTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method tells if a player can build before the worker move: if he can, he receives a notification about this possibility, otherwise he has to do a normal turn
    void canMove()
    This method checks if at least one of the two workers can move: if the workers can moves, the player can start his turn, otherwise he loses
    void canMoveSpecialTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method checks if the worker can move: if it is, the player can start his special turn and build, otherwise he loses
    void checkWin​(AskMoveEvent askMoveEvent, int indexClient)
    This method checks if a player won: if he does, notifies the win, otherwise continues his turn
    void checkWinAfterBuild​(AskBuildEvent askBuildEvent)
    This method checks if someone could win if there are complete towers on the board
    boolean controlSetNPlayer()
    This method controls if nPlayer is set
    void heartBeat​(int indexClient)
    This method resets the heartbeat counter if it receives a response from the client
    void initializeWorker​(Box box1, Box box2)
    This method sets two workers in two positions chosen by the player
    void movePlayer​(int rowStart, int columnStart, int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove)
    This method moves a worker from a box to another
    void removeExtraPlayer()
    This method removes all the players that cannot play because out of game player size
    void removePlayer​(int indexClient)
    This method removes a player if he is in a game
    boolean setBoxBuilding​(int indexWorker)
    This method sets all the boxes that a worker can reach with the building
    boolean setBoxReachable​(int indexWorker, boolean secondMove)
    This method sets all the boxes that a worker can reach
    void setCard​(int godCard)
    This method memorizes the card chosen by the player
    void setNPlayers​(int nPlayers)
    This method sets the number of players
    void setTempCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> threeCard)
    This method memorizes the two or three cards chosen by the first player
    void startGame()
    This method puts in isPlaying the first player who has to play and in goingState the game
    int whoIsLosing()
    This method tells which player is probably going to lose

  • Method Details

    • setNPlayers

      public void setNPlayers​(int nPlayers)
      This method sets the number of players
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - number of players

    • controlSetNPlayer

      public boolean controlSetNPlayer()
      This method controls if nPlayer is set
      Returns:
      true if nPlayer is set, otherwise returns false

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(int indexPlayer)
      This method starts the timer of the new player and adds the new player in the array in Game class
      Parameters:
      indexPlayer - player index

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, int age, int indexClient)
      This method adds the player and sets all the information
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      age - player age
      indexClient - client index of the player

    • removeExtraPlayer

      public void removeExtraPlayer()
      This method removes all the players that cannot play because out of game player size

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(int indexClient)
      This method removes a player if he is in a game
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index that has to be removed

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      This method puts in isPlaying the first player who has to play and in goingState the game

    • askState

      public void askState()
      This method waits that all the players are in the game

    • setTempCard

      public void setTempCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> threeCard)
      This method memorizes the two or three cards chosen by the first player
      Parameters:
      threeCard - two or three cards chosen by the first player

    • setCard

      public void setCard​(int godCard)
      This method memorizes the card chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      godCard - card chosen by the player

    • initializeWorker

      public void initializeWorker​(Box box1, Box box2)
      This method sets two workers in two positions chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      box1 - first worker box
      box2 - second worker box

    • canBuildBeforeWorkerMove

      public void canBuildBeforeWorkerMove​(int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove)
      This method tells if a player can build before the worker move
      Parameters:
      row - row of the box where the worker is
      column - column of the box where the worker is
      indexWorkerToMove - worker index that the player wants to move

    • canMove

      public void canMove()
      This method checks if at least one of the two workers can move: if the workers can moves, the player can start his turn, otherwise he loses

    • canMoveSpecialTurn

      public void canMoveSpecialTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
      This method checks if the worker can move: if it is, the player can start his special turn and build, otherwise he loses
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that the player has to move
      rowWorker - row of the box where the worker is
      columnWorker - column of the box where the worker is

    • setBoxReachable

      public boolean setBoxReachable​(int indexWorker, boolean secondMove)
      This method sets all the boxes that a worker can reach
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that the player wants to move
      secondMove - true if it is a second worker move because of a God ability, otherwise it is false
      Returns:
      boolean that identifies if there is at least one reachable box

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer​(int rowStart, int columnStart, int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove)
      This method moves a worker from a box to another
      Parameters:
      rowStart - row of the box where the worker is
      columnStart - column of the box where the worker is
      row - row of the box where the player wants to reach
      column - column of the box where the player wants to reach
      indexWorkerToMove - worker index that the player moves

    • checkWin

      public void checkWin​(AskMoveEvent askMoveEvent, int indexClient)
      This method checks if a player won: if he does, notifies the win, otherwise continues his turn
      Parameters:
      askMoveEvent - object with all the information about the worker move
      indexClient - client index who is playing

    • canBuild

      public void canBuild​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
      This method checks if the worker can build: if he cannot, the player loses, receives a lose notification and the other players receive a notification about who lost. If the worker can build, the player can continue his turn with the building
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who is playing
      indexWorker - worker index that has to build
      rowWorker - row of the box where the worker is
      columnWorker - column of the box where the worker is

    • canBuildSpecialTurn

      public void canBuildSpecialTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
      This method tells if a player can build before the worker move: if he can, he receives a notification about this possibility, otherwise he has to do a normal turn
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that has to build or hat to be moved
      rowWorker - row of the box where the worker is
      columnWorker - column of the box where the worker is

    • setBoxBuilding

      public boolean setBoxBuilding​(int indexWorker)
      This method sets all the boxes that a worker can reach with the building
      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that has to build
      Returns:
      boolean that identifies if there is at least one reachable box

    • buildBlock

      public void buildBlock​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int row, int column, boolean isSpecialTurn, int indexPossibleBlock)
      This method builds a block in a box
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who is playing
      indexWorker - worker index that builds
      rowWorker - row of the box where the player wants to build
      columnWorker - column of the box where the player wants to build
      row - row of the box where the player wants to build
      column - column of the box where the player wants to build
      isSpecialTurn - true if the player built before the worker move, otherwise is false
      indexPossibleBlock - index of the block that the player wants to build

    • checkWinAfterBuild

      public void checkWinAfterBuild​(AskBuildEvent askBuildEvent)
      This method checks if someone could win if there are complete towers on the board
      Parameters:
      askBuildEvent - object with all the information about the building move

    • whoIsLosing

      public int whoIsLosing()
      This method tells which player is probably going to lose
      Returns:
      the index of the player that maybe is going to lose

    • heartBeat

      public void heartBeat​(int indexClient)
      This method resets the heartbeat counter if it receives a response from the client
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who sends the heartbeat response
